nodes.text: "O'reenian Hospitality" is an adventure idea in the The Unknown Regions, a 2010 supplement to the Star Wars Roleplaying Game Saga Edition from Wizards of the Coast, which was written by Sterling Hershey, Rodney Thompson, and Daniel Wallace. The plot sends a group of heroes, the player characters, to the planet O'reen in the Unknown Regions after a miscalculated hyperspace jump. They crash-land on the world away from the heavily fortified cities, but they sense themselves tracked by many orbital emplacements and decide to hide. An O'reenian patrol impounds their ship, prompting the characters to break into the city Orbital Deployment Center to get it back, as well as to repair it. Once they succeed, they leave the world—only to discover some O'reenians have stowed away to take the ship back once more.
